title: Looking for reliable Gold+ player to help carry me out of Silver
body:
Looking for a solid player who doesn't get tilted very easily and would like to help carry me out of Silver. I play a range of Top and Mid champions so I can accommodate to your champion pool. I have had a lot of experience playing in Gold with some Platinum friends but have never been able to solo carry myself out of Silver. Please help! Add me as a friend if you would like to help out a fellow summoner. | (• ◡•)| (❍ᴥ❍ʋ)

I am currently in Silver 1 struggling to fight into Gold
